name: SecKeychainPromptSelector
desc: Bits that define when a keychain should require a passphrase.

items.name: static var requirePassphase: SecKeychainPromptSelector
items.desc: Indicates that a passphrase should be required for every access.

items.name: static var unsigned: SecKeychainPromptSelector
items.desc: Indicates that a passphrase should be required when an unsigned application attempts to use the keychain, overriding the system default.

items.name: static var unsignedAct: SecKeychainPromptSelector
items.desc: Indicates that a passphrase should be required when an unsigned application attempts to use the keychain.

items.name: static var invalid: SecKeychainPromptSelector
items.desc: Indicates that a passphrase should be required when an application with an invalid signature attempts to use the keychain, overriding the system default.

items.name: static var invalidAct: SecKeychainPromptSelector
items.desc: Indicates that a passphrase should be required when an application with an invalid signature attempts to use the keychain.
